TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NetTcpSecurity extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定以 設定之端點所用的傳輸層級與訊息層級安全性型別。

span.span: Specifies the types of transport-level and message-level security used by an endpoint configured with a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個標準繫結提供了控制傳輸安全性需求的參數。Each of the standard bindings provides parameters for controlling the transfer security requirements. 這些參數通常會包含安全性模式，此模式會指定是否採用訊息層級或傳輸層級安全性，以及選擇用戶端認證型別。These parameters typically include the security mode that specified whether message-level or transport-level security is used and the choice of client credential type. 根據這些參數所代表的選取選項，會以適當安全性來建構通道堆疊。Based on the choice of options these parameters present, a channel stack is constructed with appropriate security. 由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 提供的系統提供繫結程序，是設計成符合某些最常見案例需求的一組繫結程序。The system-provided bindings supplied by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) are a set designed to meet some of the most common scenario requirements. 這些每個繫結程序都允許特定目標案例的安全性需求規格。Each of these bindings allows the specification of security requirements for some specific targeted scenarios. 提供 的安全性規格。 provides the security specifications for . 這是一個安全、可靠且最佳的繫結，適用於跨電腦通訊。This is a secure, reliable, optimized binding suitable for cross-machine communication. 根據預設，它會產生執行階段通訊堆疊，可支援 TCP 訊息傳遞、Windows 安全性 (提供訊息安全性與驗證)、WS-ReliableMessaging (提升可靠性) 以及二進位訊息編碼。By default it generates a run-time communication stack that supports TCP for message delivery and Windows Security for message security and authentication, WS-ReliableMessaging for reliability, and binary message encoding. 此類別由 所產生，並可由名為 的唯讀屬性存取。This class is instantiated by the , and can be accessed by a read-only property called . 由於這是唯讀屬性，因此您無法變更傳回的物件。Because this property is read-only you cannot make changes to the returned object. 如果想要控制 物件的建立，可以從 衍生類別。If you want to control the creation of the object, you can derive a class from . ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何從 擷取 物件，並印出它包含的多項設定︰The following code shows how to retrieve the object from a and prints out the various settings it contains: [!code-csharp[S_UE_TcpSecurity#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_tcpsecurity/cs/service.cs#0)]

summary.span: 取得以 設定之服務的訊息層級安全性需求的型別。

span.span: Gets the type of message-level security requirements for a service configured with a .

value.span: ，代表端點的訊息層級安全性需求的型別。

span.span: The that indicates the type of message-level security requirements for an endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用訊息層級安全性來達成 SOAP 訊息的完整性與機密性，以及通訊對等兩端的交互驗證。 uses message-level security for the integrity and confidentiality of the SOAP message and for mutual authentication of the communication peers. 如果繫結上選取了這個安全性模式，通道堆疊會以訊息安全性繫結項目進行設定，且 SOAP 訊息的安全性會符合 WS-Security\* 標準。If this security mode is selected on a binding, the channel stack is configured with message security binding elements and the SOAP messages are secured in compliance with WS-Security\* standards. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_TcpSecurity#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_tcpsecurity/cs/service.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::SecurityMode Mode { System::ServiceModel::SecurityMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::SecurityMode value); };
member this.Mode : System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定以 設定的端點是否使用訊息層級安全性與傳輸層級安全性。

span.span: Gets or sets whether message-level security and transport-level security are used by an endpoint configured with a .

value.span: 的值，這個值表示端點是否使用訊息層級安全性與傳輸層級安全性。

span.span: A value of the that indicates whether message-level security or transport-level security is used by an endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性模式決定了端點所需的安全性類型。The security mode determines the type of security required by an endpoint. Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 安全性提供各種不同的機制，用來保護系統提供繫結所設定的訊息傳輸。Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) security offers a variety of mechanisms with which to secure the transfer of messages that are configured with the system-provided bindings. 每個繫結都支援這些安全性模式的子集。Each of the bindings supports a subset of these security modes. 該模式決定訊息傳輸安全性功能 (完整性、機密性與驗證) 需要哪些機制。The mode determines the mechanisms by which message transfer security functions (integrity, confidentiality and authentication) are required. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_TcpSecurity#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_tcpsecurity/cs/service.cs#2)]

summary.span: 取得以 設定之端點的訊息層級安全性需求的型別。

span.span: Gets the type of message-level security requirements for an endpoint configured with a .

value.span: ，代表端點的傳輸層級安全性需求的型別。

span.span: The that indicates the type of transport-level security requirements for an endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 安全性來達成 SOAP 訊息的完整性與機密性，以及交互驗證。Use security for integrity and confidentiality of the SOAP message and for mutual authentication. 如果繫結上選取了這個安全性模式，通道堆疊會以安全性傳輸進行設定，且 SOAP 訊息會使用傳輸安全性 (如 TCP 上的 HTTPS 或 SSL) 保護。If this security mode is selected on a binding, the channel stack is configured using a secure transport and the SOAP messages are secured using transport security such as HTTPS or SSL over TCP. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_TcpSecurity#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_tcpsecurity/cs/service.cs#3)]
